Package it.polimi.ingsw.ps51.model

Class Playground

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.ps51.utility.Observable<EventForClient>
it.polimi.ingsw.ps51.model.Playground
All Implemented Interfaces:
SquareObserver
public class Playground
extends Observable<EventForClient>
implements SquareObserver
This is the main class of the model and represents the actual sate of the game

    java.util.List<Player> getPlayers()

    The method is called by a square that noticed a change in it's status and consequently send a MapUpdate message to all the players to inform them about a change in the map's configuration

    Remove a player from the playground, this could happen in a 3-player game, where a player lose but the other two continue to play the game

    • removePlayer

      public void removePlayer​(Player player)
      Remove a player from the playground, this could happen in a 3-player game, where a player lose but the other two continue to play the game
      Parameters:
      player - the player that lost the match

    • mapUpdated

      public void mapUpdated()
      The method is called by a square that noticed a change in it's status and consequently send a MapUpdate message to all the players to inform them about a change in the map's configuration
